title: Sunshine Day
content:
The sun shines bright up in the sky
The birds sing songs as they fly by
Flowers dance in morning light
Everything feels just right

Bees buzz around from flower to flower
Nature shows us its sweet power
Butterflies with wings so wide
Take us on a magical ride

title: My Pet Cat
content:
Fluffy is my little cat
She loves to sleep upon my mat
With whiskers long and eyes so bright
She purrs with me throughout the night

When I'm sad, she comes to play
Chasing shadows all the day
My furry friend, so soft and sweet
Makes my happiness complete

title: Ocean Waves
content:
Rolling waves upon the shore
Crash and splash forevermore
Seashells scattered in the sand
Treasures from the ocean's hand

Sailboats dancing on the blue
Whales and dolphins passing through
Ocean deep and ocean wide
Secrets in the changing tide

title: Rainbow Colors
content:
Red like apples on a tree
Orange sunset by the sea
Yellow sunshine in the day
Green grass where children play

Blue sky stretching far and wide
Purple flowers side by side
Colors bright and colors new
Rainbows just for me and you
